subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: At the P.G.A. Championship, Jason Day broke through with his first win in a major, but top golfers such as Sergio Garcia and Lee Westwood remain without a major title.
snippet: At the P.G.A. Championship, Jason Day broke through with his first win in a major, but top golfers such as Sergio Garcia and Lee Westwood remain without a major title.
